blog.name: waitingfortwilight
blog.title: Kate
blog.description: 23 but often grumbles like a 90 year old // oh so very English // I write about Harry, feedback is always appreciated, but be NICE or don’t bother // Requests are currently CLOSED // Masterlist Kiddies!

summary: A List of Every Blurb, Imagine and One Shot!
title: A List of Every Blurb, Imagine and One Shot!
body:
Most recent pieces are at the top!

* Indicates filth (smut)

~ Indicates reader favourite!

¬ Personal favourite!

¬*The Cottage - Sarah is your best friend and invites Harry to be the temporary resident for your vacant spare room. (13.4k)

¬*A Piano In St. Lucia - A little something about a honeymoon with Harry. (2.8k)

By the Seaside - A blurb about your vacation to the Isle of Wight with Harry. (1.9k)

¬Always You - You host Harry and a few others at your lake house to avoid being lonely at a certain time of year. (6.5k)

Alleged Masterplan (collab!) - Harry gives you something of his that you weren’t expecting. (2k)

¬Private Universe Part I - Part II - *Part III - *Part IV - Harry visits a children’s hospital and meets you. (32.3k)

~*Guinea Pig - Your dad starts dating again after your mum passes, but his new beau is not someone you’d expected. (10k+)

Selfish - Harry moves back home with his son newly single to reconnect with you. (3.5k)

~Miss Fortune - A woman on Harry’s flight convinces him to finally confess his feelings. (5.5k)

Aisle Seat - Harry is intrigued by the girl sat across from him on his flight home. (1k)

¬Peas. - A stupid blurb about Harry’s obsession with garden peas. (1k)

¬~*Subtitles - You’re deaf and Harry is besotted with you. (5k+)

An Entire Week - You’ve been struggling with insomnia and forget a very important date. (1k)

~*Tell Him To Fuck Off - Your quiet Sunday morning is interrupted by a work call and you take a certain thing into your own hands. (1k)

We Despise Each Other Part I - Part II - Part III - *Part IV - *Part V - You’ve known Harry for years and he’s always been an arse - plus bestfriend!Liam (21k)

*Car. Now. - You and Harry are at a family party and you let loose. (2k)

¬A Probability - You’re feeling a little off and it’s almost Harry’s birthday. (2k)

~*Let Me See You - Harry is your housemate and he comes home early to find you helping yourself. (3k+)

¬Nippers Part I - Part II - Part III - You’re married with kids but Harry isn’t your husband. (20k)

¬~Sit Down - Lie With Me (Part II) - Your relationship with Harry has grown distant and you argue over a bowl of soup and a blender. (4.5k)

blog.name: waitingfortwilight
blog.title: Kate
blog.description: 23 but often grumbles like a 90 year old // oh so very English // I write about Harry, feedback is always appreciated, but be NICE or don’t bother // Requests are currently CLOSED // Masterlist Kiddies!

summary: Hey! Please do an imagine where Y/N and Harry have a fight about the food she made? Like Harry doesn't like it and he insults...
question: Hey! Please do an imagine where Y/N and Harry have a fight about the food she made? Like Harry doesn't like it and he insults her cooking skills? And then she doesn't cook for him for the rest of the week and he apologizes with a dinner date! Do this I'll love you forever and ever
answer:
You have been waiting so long for this and I’m so sorry! Either way I hope it’s what you wanted, all my love!

If there was ever a moment you’d want to scream at the top of your lungs to just really let your bastard emotions be known - it would be right now. Your ears are hot and ringing, throat tight as you attempt to swallow it down with a bite of your food. You can feel the back of your neck prickling with heat as your anger and hurt begins to rise in your chest, eyes wide yet brows furrowed as you stare at your boyfriend in disbelief.

“What?” You spit, throat coated with a mixture of your anger and the mouthful of curry you just about managed to swallow. The word is tight on delivery, cracking in every possible place, and you feel the need to swallow again.

“I said it doesn’t taste right.” Harry repeats himself, staring at you in bewilderment since your entire demeanour had changed with the flick of a switch about five seconds ago.

“No, I heard you, Harry.” You mutter through gritted teeth, setting your cutlery down before you maybe do something stupid with it. “What do you mean ‘it doesn’t taste right’?”

Harry stares from you to his bowl and back, swallowing the lump in his own throat before he answers. “I don’t know, I think it’s the chicken.”

“Well it’s fucking Quorn, Harry.” You remind him, leaning back in your chair and folding your arms across your chest. “Think I’m just gonna force you to eat actual chicken when you’ve started this fucking vegetarian diet?”

“I’m just saying it’s a bit odd, love. That’s all…”

“Make your own fucking dinner in future then.” You grumble, abruptly standing from your seat at the table and taking your curry with you.

“Why are you getting so snippy about it? I only made a bloody comment, love!”

“It took me fucking ages to make this shit!” You screech, because you really had had to start prepping it early this morning if you were going to do the recipe properly. “I never said anything when you wanted to start this diet, I just went with it. And I’m trying to make it easy for you but apparently you’re going to be a prick about it.”

“Calm down, for crying out loud.” Harry says with a roll of his eyes, which absolutely does not help the near rage in the pit of your belly. “I didn’t mean any harm by it.”

“It’s too fucking late, Harry. Harm done.”

He watches you as you leave with your food in hand, completely baffled by your outburst. It’s not like you to get so easily wound up by something, especially not something he said. He’s irritated actually - that you’ve been away from each other for a while and today is his first day home, and you’re already kicking off with him about something. So much for having a nice week or so to yourselves.

~

When Harry wakes the next morning you’re not in bed beside him. For the remainder of last night you were absent, ignoring him until it was time for bed, and even then you kept yourself on the very edge of the bed.

He sits up and stretches, his nose greeted with smell of sausages and bacon, his mouth instantly watering. Until he remembers he can’t eat that anymore and he feels a bit put out. Were you doing it on purpose?

Yes you were.

When Harry enters the kitchen you’re just sitting at the dining table basically a near fry-up in front of you, not even sparing him a single glance as you begin to tuck in.

“Is there… anything for me?” He asks awkwardly, flicking the kettle on to boil. He knows it’s a dangerous question, in fact it was tight in his chest as he asked, but he felt the need to nonetheless, just to weigh how much shit he really was in.

“Whatever you can find to make yourself.” You tell him flatly between mouthfuls, still refusing to look at him.

Harry feels his heart deflate a little at your reply, not really expecting you to be so cold after a small argument over something like dinner. So he just goes with it for now, knowing you’ll get over it sooner or later.

~

Harry’s a little nervous. He’s sitting at the table waiting for you to come back from your sister’s house, alternating between chewing on his lip and biting his nails.

So he fucked up earlier in the week - he gets that now. There were a hundred other ways he could have approached the situation rather than just ‘this tastes shit’, but he’s an idiot at times; his mouth rules his head.

All week you’ve been ignoring him - in fact you’ve barely uttered a word to him besides the usual ‘yes’ or ‘no’. It’s eating him up. Because he knows that you’re feeling neglected, especially when he’s barely home at the moment. He’s just come back from being away for months and the first thing he did was insult you.

So yeah - he’s feeling a little guilty.

He flinches at the sound of the door opening, rising from his seat to greet you in the hallway.

“Hi.” He mumbles, standing under the kitchen doorframe and fiddling with his rings.

You glance his way as you take your shoes off, kicking them onto the rack and shrugging out of your coat. “Hi.”

“Did you um, have a nice time at your sister’s?”

You nod limply but offer nothing more as you head for the stairs. You’re caught a little of guard when Harry reaches for your wrist, and you frown up at him in confusion.

“Wait, um,” he stutters, pulling you towards him gently, “I need to apologise. For the other day.”

You sigh and angle yourself right in front of him. “Harry, I’m too tired to talk about th-,”

“No, please,” He begs, lightly caressing your cheek with the backs of his fingers, “just come with me a sec?”

It doesn’t take you long to give in, because you can see the sincerity in his eyes, and the pleading. So you nod and allow him to pull you into the kitchen.

You’re not expecting what you see - the room completely dark besides the ensemble of tea lights in the middle of the dining room table, two glasses of wine above two place settings, even with the cloth napkins you only use for special occasions.

“W-what’s this?”

Harry releases a long and drawn out breath from beside you, before pulling you into his chest with a tight embrace. “I’m sorry, love. Was a right dick the other day, don’t even know why.”

You heave a mirrored breath into his chest, wrapping your arms around his middle while he peppers kisses into your loose hair.

“Wasn’t even that bad, I swear.” He laughs a single, bitter hum, which you have to join in with. “Honestly, I don’t know why I said anything and I wish I hadn’t.”

“So do I.” Your voice is muffled by his chest, but he still catches your comment and chuckles.

Harry rests his finger under your chin and brings your head up to look into your eyes. “I’m a twat, but I’m a twat that loves you. And I am sorry.”

“M’sorry for getting so stroppy about it.” You mumble, but he shakes his head at you.

He leans down to press a soft kiss to your lips. “Nope, this is all on me.”

“Still, might’ve overreacted…”

His brilliant smile pulls his lips upwards, his fingers grazing your cheek again. “Not gonna agree because it’ll only end up worse for me again.”

You let out a giggle and nod up at him, holding yourself tighter to him. “Probably a smart decision.” You agree, reaching up to kiss him again, before freeing yourself from him to look at the laid table. “So, whats for dinner?”

Harry chuckles as he moves around you and pulls a chair out for you. “Not curry with Quorn pieces - that’s for sure.”

~~~

Thiiiiis could be rubbish…

Tag list: @pxrrishly @permanentllyharry @talesofstyles @abundantlyabundant @joan-of-disappointment @staceystoleyourheart @hoeforhaz @harry12styles94 @belikebebe @harryismydaddy21 @joycelovedorial @evaolin @harrystyles-concepts @harryisalittleshit @newtosaur250 @sydneys-life-blog @flowerrrrrchilddd @belle-ofthe-sea @grace-leigh @winchesterwife27 @lovableah @particularnarry @secret-lil-rendez-vous @stylesangelsx @thefireisgone

You can feel the back of your neck prickling with heat as your anger and hurt begins to rise in your chest, eyes wide yet brows furrowed as you stare at your boyfriend in disbelief.

“What?” You spit, throat coated with a mixture of your anger and the mouthful of curry you just about managed to swallow. The word is tight on delivery, cracking in every possible place, and you feel the need to swallow again.

“I said it doesn’t taste right.” Harry repeats himself, staring at you in bewilderment since your entire demeanour had changed with the flick of a switch about five seconds ago.

“No, I heard you, Harry.” You mutter through gritted teeth, setting your cutlery down before you maybe do something stupid with it. “What do you mean ‘it doesn’t taste right’?”

Harry stares from you to his bowl and back, swallowing the lump in his own throat before he answers. “I don’t know, I think it’s the chicken.”

“Well it’s fucking Quorn, Harry.” You remind him, leaning back in your chair and folding your arms across your chest. “Think I’m just gonna force you to eat actual chicken when you’ve started this fucking vegetarian diet?”

“I’m just saying it’s a bit odd, love. That’s all…”

“Make your own fucking dinner in future then.” You grumble, abruptly standing from your seat at the table and taking your curry with you.

“Why are you getting so snippy about it? I only made a bloody comment, love!”

“It took me fucking ages to make this shit!” You screech, because you really had had to start prepping it early this morning if you were going to do the recipe properly. “I never said anything when you wanted to start this diet, I just went with it. And I’m trying to make it easy for you but apparently you’re going to be a prick about it.”

“Calm down, for crying out loud.” Harry says with a roll of his eyes, which absolutely does not help the near rage in the pit of your belly. “I didn’t mean any harm by it.”

“It’s too fucking late, Harry. Harm done.”

He watches you as you leave with your food in hand, completely baffled by your outburst. It’s not like you to get so easily wound up by something, especially not something he said. He’s irritated actually - that you’ve been away from each other for a while and today is his first day home, and you’re already kicking off with him about something. So much for having a nice week or so to yourselves.

~

When Harry wakes the next morning you’re not in bed beside him. For the remainder of last night you were absent, ignoring him until it was time for bed, and even then you kept yourself on the very edge of the bed.

He sits up and stretches, his nose greeted with smell of sausages and bacon, his mouth instantly watering. Until he remembers he can’t eat that anymore and he feels a bit put out. Were you doing it on purpose?

Yes you were.

When Harry enters the kitchen you’re just sitting at the dining table basically a near fry-up in front of you, not even sparing him a single glance as you begin to tuck in.

“Is there… anything for me?” He asks awkwardly, flicking the kettle on to boil. He knows it’s a dangerous question, in fact it was tight in his chest as he asked, but he felt the need to nonetheless, just to weigh how much shit he really was in.

“Whatever you can find to make yourself.” You tell him flatly between mouthfuls, still refusing to look at him.

Harry feels his heart deflate a little at your reply, not really expecting you to be so cold after a small argument over something like dinner. So he just goes with it for now, knowing you’ll get over it sooner or later.

~

Harry’s a little nervous. He’s sitting at the table waiting for you to come back from your sister’s house, alternating between chewing on his lip and biting his nails.

So he fucked up earlier in the week - he gets that now. There were a hundred other ways he could have approached the situation rather than just ‘this tastes shit’, but he’s an idiot at times; his mouth rules his head.

All week you’ve been ignoring him - in fact you’ve barely uttered a word to him besides the usual ‘yes’ or ‘no’. It’s eating him up. Because he knows that you’re feeling neglected, especially when he’s barely home at the moment. He’s just come back from being away for months and the first thing he did was insult you.

So yeah - he’s feeling a little guilty.

He flinches at the sound of the door opening, rising from his seat to greet you in the hallway.

“Hi.” He mumbles, standing under the kitchen doorframe and fiddling with his rings.

You glance his way as you take your shoes off, kicking them onto the rack and shrugging out of your coat. “Hi.”

“Did you um, have a nice time at your sister’s?”

You nod limply but offer nothing more as you head for the stairs. You’re caught a little of guard when Harry reaches for your wrist, and you frown up at him in confusion.

“Wait, um,” he stutters, pulling you towards him gently, “I need to apologise. For the other day.”

You sigh and angle yourself right in front of him. “Harry, I’m too tired to talk about th-,”

“No, please,” He begs, lightly caressing your cheek with the backs of his fingers, “just come with me a sec?”

It doesn’t take you long to give in, because you can see the sincerity in his eyes, and the pleading. So you nod and allow him to pull you into the kitchen.

You’re not expecting what you see - the room completely dark besides the ensemble of tea lights in the middle of the dining room table, two glasses of wine above two place settings, even with the cloth napkins you only use for special occasions.

“W-what’s this?”

Harry releases a long and drawn out breath from beside you, before pulling you into his chest with a tight embrace. “I’m sorry, love. Was a right dick the other day, don’t even know why.”

You heave a mirrored breath into his chest, wrapping your arms around his middle while he peppers kisses into your loose hair.

“Wasn’t even that bad, I swear.” He laughs a single, bitter hum, which you have to join in with. “Honestly, I don’t know why I said anything and I wish I hadn’t.”

“So do I.” Your voice is muffled by his chest, but he still catches your comment and chuckles.

Harry rests his finger under your chin and brings your head up to look into your eyes. “I’m a twat, but I’m a twat that loves you. And I am sorry.”

“M’sorry for getting so stroppy about it.” You mumble, but he shakes his head at you.

He leans down to press a soft kiss to your lips. “Nope, this is all on me.”

“Still, might’ve overreacted…”

His brilliant smile pulls his lips upwards, his fingers grazing your cheek again. “Not gonna agree because it’ll only end up worse for me again.”

You let out a giggle and nod up at him, holding yourself tighter to him. “Probably a smart decision.” You agree, reaching up to kiss him again, before freeing yourself from him to look at the laid table. “So, whats for dinner?”

Harry chuckles as he moves around you and pulls a chair out for you. “Not curry with Quorn pieces - that’s for sure.”

~~~

Thiiiiis could be rubbish…

Tag list: @pxrrishly @permanentllyharry @talesofstyles @abundantlyabundant @joan-of-disappointment @staceystoleyourheart @hoeforhaz @harry12styles94 @belikebebe @harryismydaddy21 @joycelovedorial @evaolin @harrystyles-concepts @harryisalittleshit @newtosaur250 @sydneys-life-blog @flowerrrrrchilddd @belle-ofthe-sea @grace-leigh @winchesterwife27 @lovableah @particularnarry @secret-lil-rendez-vous @stylesangelsx @thefireisgone
trail.content:
You have been waiting so long for this and I’m so sorry! Either way I hope it’s what you wanted, all my love!

Your ears are hot and ringing, throat tight as you attempt to swallow it down with a bite of your food. You can feel the back of your neck prickling with heat as your anger and hurt begins to rise in your chest, eyes wide yet brows furrowed as you stare at your boyfriend in disbelief.

blog.name: thedevilinbetweenthesheets
blog.title: Nat
blog.description: Harry Styles' Lover · Ask Me · Masterlist · Creatures of the Night Masterlist · Song Cover Masterlist · Requests are always open !

summary: Yes! Part 2 to the angst blurb please!!!
question: Yes! Part 2 to the angst blurb please!!!
answer:
Yes! It’s here!!!

Part One is here!

“I think we should break up.”

It has been a month since what they call ‘The backstage incident’. 

In these days Harry was trying to contact his girlfriend, although she seems like she had lost faith in him. Harry doesn’t blame her. How can he? That poor girl had been hurt after what she saw. Her boyfriend kissing another woman. He was mad at himself, really. He should’ve saw how the way that girl, Vicky looked at him. That girl’s eyes were sparkling whenever she saw him. 

Everyone told him to be careful of her, but he was too focused on other stuff and ignored it. But Harry regretted it instantly when Vicky asked to meet him in his dressing room privately, more so when she leaned in and kissed him. He was pushing her away, but then his girlfriend walked in. 

His heart instantly sank into his stomach, he couldn’t care about Vicky anymore, he just wants to explain to his beloved girlfriend about what happened. “What a show.” Y/N said. Harry knew that she was in pain, she was hurting. Because she’s a kind soul and wouldn’t say anything to hurt anyone. But that day her tone was cold and full of irony. 

After that day, Harry fired Vicky, and called/texted Y/N every two days telling her how sorry he is. Of course he knew that this isn’t gonna work, it’s not sincere enough. But he couldn’t just walk away, he was occupied with work.

So he waited patiently until his break, and flew back to the city that both of them live in.

That day was Y/N’s day off, because she was busing herself by working non-stop, and her manager told her that she had done so much work for the past month, she deserve a break despite the fact that she doesn’t want one.

It was raining cats and dogs outside, the sky was so dark even though it was only noon. And Y/N was done cleaning the whole house, she had nothing to do anymore. She laid down on her sofa, blanket covering her cold hands and feet. 

Buzz.

It’s her phone again, it had been ringing and buzzing for the whole morning. Y/N sighed while she unlocked her phone and glanced at the messages. 


                                              Today 10:14 AM

Y/N. 

I’m so sorry. Please forgive me.

I didn’t kiss her that day, she kissed me and when I’m about to push her away, you walked in. 

I know you’re still angry, and I know this isn’t the way to apologise, but please give me a chance, I’ll explain everything to you. I will be waiting at the same old place, and I’m not leaving until you show up.

He’s waiting at the place where they had their first kiss, a garden that he found out when he was having his morning run, and she fell in love with that place as soon as she walked in.

The thunder claps, Y/N suddenly remembered that it’s raining. She looked at the time he sent that message. 10:30 AM. 

Was he still there? She was worried. It’s been two hours!

She knew Harry is a man of his words, he always kept his promises, and it means that he’s still in the garden. With that in mind, Y/N quickly took her jacket and an umbrella and went out to meet Harry. She didn’t even bothered to change her pyjamas. 

When she arrived at the garden, she saw Harry. Standing in the rain, without an umbrella. He must’ve forgot because this morning it was still sunny.

“Harry.” Y/N handed him the umbrella. “It’s raining, what are you doing?”

“Did you get my message? I’m waiting for you.” He looked at her like she’s the treasure he found. “I miss you.”

“I did get your message, H. But…it’s raining and…you should head home.” Her brows furrowed. “We can talk later, but please, let’s just go home, I don’t want you to be sick.”

He nodded. “At least you’re willing to talk it out.”

They arrived back at her house, Y/N made both of them a cup of hot tea while he’s in the shower. 

“Hey.” Harry said, with a white towel on his head. Y/N sighed, patted the empty spot beside her, asking him to sit down. She took the towel in her hands and start drying his hair.“Start talking, pretty boy.”

He explained the whole thing to her, his heart was beating fast, he’s afraid that she wouldn’t forgive him. “I’m…very sorry, Y/N.”

“I’ve already forgive you from the second I walked into the garden.”Y/N smiled at him, Harry took her in his arms. “I love you, so much.”

“Me too, H.”

Main Masterlist

He explained the whole thing to her, his heart was beating fast, he’s afraid that she wouldn’t forgive him. “I’m…very sorry, Y/N.”

“I’ve already forgive you from the second I walked into the garden.”Y/N smiled at him, Harry took her in his arms. “I love you, so much.”

“Me too, H.”

In these days Harry was trying to contact his girlfriend, although she seems like she had lost faith in him. Harry doesn’t blame her. How can he? That poor girl had been hurt after what she saw. Her boyfriend kissing another woman. He was mad at himself, really. He should’ve saw how the way that girl, Vicky looked at him. That girl’s eyes were sparkling whenever she saw him. 

Everyone told him to be careful of her, but he was too focused on other stuff and ignored it. But Harry regretted it instantly when Vicky asked to meet him in his dressing room privately, more so when she leaned in and kissed him. He was pushing her away, but then his girlfriend walked in. 

His heart instantly sank into his stomach, he couldn’t care about Vicky anymore, he just wants to explain to his beloved girlfriend about what happened. “What a show.” Y/N said. Harry knew that she was in pain, she was hurting. Because she’s a kind soul and wouldn’t say anything to hurt anyone. But that day her tone was cold and full of irony. 

After that day, Harry fired Vicky, and called/texted Y/N every two days telling her how sorry he is. Of course he knew that this isn’t gonna work, it’s not sincere enough. But he couldn’t just walk away, he was occupied with work.

So he waited patiently until his break, and flew back to the city that both of them live in.

That day was Y/N’s day off, because she was busing herself by working non-stop, and her manager told her that she had done so much work for the past month, she deserve a break despite the fact that she doesn’t want one.

It was raining cats and dogs outside, the sky was so dark even though it was only noon. And Y/N was done cleaning the whole house, she had nothing to do anymore. She laid down on her sofa, blanket covering her cold hands and feet. 

Buzz.

It’s her phone again, it had been ringing and buzzing for the whole morning. Y/N sighed while she unlocked her phone and glanced at the messages. 


                                              Today 10:14 AM

Y/N. 

I’m so sorry. Please forgive me.

I didn’t kiss her that day, she kissed me and when I’m about to push her away, you walked in. 

I know you’re still angry, and I know this isn’t the way to apologise, but please give me a chance, I’ll explain everything to you. I will be waiting at the same old place, and I’m not leaving until you show up.

He’s waiting at the place where they had their first kiss, a garden that he found out when he was having his morning run, and she fell in love with that place as soon as she walked in.

The thunder claps, Y/N suddenly remembered that it’s raining. She looked at the time he sent that message. 10:30 AM. 

Was he still there? She was worried. It’s been two hours!

She knew Harry is a man of his words, he always kept his promises, and it means that he’s still in the garden. With that in mind, Y/N quickly took her jacket and an umbrella and went out to meet Harry. She didn’t even bothered to change her pyjamas. 

When she arrived at the garden, she saw Harry. Standing in the rain, without an umbrella. He must’ve forgot because this morning it was still sunny.

“Harry.” Y/N handed him the umbrella. “It’s raining, what are you doing?”

“Did you get my message? I’m waiting for you.” He looked at her like she’s the treasure he found. “I miss you.”

“I did get your message, H. But…it’s raining and…you should head home.” Her brows furrowed. “We can talk later, but please, let’s just go home, I don’t want you to be sick.”

He nodded. “At least you’re willing to talk it out.”

They arrived back at her house, Y/N made both of them a cup of hot tea while he’s in the shower. 

“Hey.” Harry said, with a white towel on his head. Y/N sighed, patted the empty spot beside her, asking him to sit down. She took the towel in her hands and start drying his hair.“Start talking, pretty boy.”

He explained the whole thing to her, his heart was beating fast, he’s afraid that she wouldn’t forgive him. “I’m…very sorry, Y/N.”

“I’ve already forgive you from the second I walked into the garden.”Y/N smiled at him, Harry took her in his arms. “I love you, so much.”

“Me too, H.”

Main Masterlist
